text: Aur agar tum safar mein ho aur likhney wala na pao to rehan qabzay mein rakh liya kero haan agar aapas mein aik doosray say mutmaeen ho to jissay amanat di gaee hai woh ussay ada ker dey aur Allah Taalaa say darat rahey jo uss ka rab hai aur gawahi ko na chupao aur jo issay chupa ley woh gunehgar dil wala hai aur jo kuch tum kertay ho ussay Allah Taalaa khoob janta hai
